about_the_game:
Note: The developer accidentally clicked the publish button on October 22nd. The DLC content hasn't updated yet, but it's now available for sale with a launch discount. Purchasers during this period will have to wait until November for the update.

This DLC includes:

1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons.

A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent.

After purchase, you can equip the appearance at the weapon NPC in-game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
